rules_text:
Whenever you salvage this or another card onto a creature or Vehicle you control, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.
Salvage {2}{U} [i]({2}{U}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a number of +1/+1 counters equal to this card's power on target creature or Vehicle. Salvage only as a sorcery.)[/i]
